lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I didn't know if it was going to work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Our first sponsor, our friends for the entirety of Campaign Two, D&D Beyond.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we acknowledging that right now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have a good sound guy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sure this doesn't break any--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Travis, you're in one of these, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, yeah, so sometimes when you do auditions, you do a partner read, yeah, and sometimes--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But he's not even next to the mic.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whoa, how'd you get to the campsite so fast?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Easy, I drove here in my 2019 D&D Beyond XLS.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With true four-wheel drive, stable tech steering, and a fuel-injected V8, D&D Beyond gets me anywhere I want to go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's so weak and puny, just like me, (resigned) Travis Willingham.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On-road or off, the D&D Beyond gets you there in style.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (through his teeth) Mind if I take it for a spin?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No way, baby bro! Get your own D&D Beyond.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, okay, some edits there, but I'll work on it later.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That was such a cool voice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But my doctor told me about D&D Beyond.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Say goodbye to genital herpes at D&D Beyond.com.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I did some good auditions tonight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know if that's legally... okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're so sorry. We're so sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Why didn't you read this? Dammit!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We have a merch update from you, Laura, I believe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is an exciting one, guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Those are designed by OG Critter, Kennef Riggles, so thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And in addition to that, we also have-- oh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have them in the store, and we have, I think, some here at the studios, so we're all going to be taking some home with us.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll put the pin on my jean jacket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The pins are in US and UK store, and then the shirts are just in the US store for now, but they will be coming to the UK store, so.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know I hate this shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It could happen in game, if we putter around long enough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's so embarrassed! Look at her getting all warm and red.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's time to settle down, and start thinking about what you want to do, and really, you know, get a proper job or something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My parents will be stoked, take my life seriously.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You've got to be a real person.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And welcome back, everyone. So last we left off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) See if we can get some music going here. So.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What would you like to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Spending all the money on booze, and we're going to have just a rager party for a week, trash the place, top to bottom.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. If you leave out a tip jar, you can make your money back, and then, sometimes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I look at Beau and go, let's claim our room, and I go running up the stairs to find the room that we want.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I go walking up the stairs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I throw open all the doors, and I'm looking at all of them, and I'm comparing each one, because there is definitely a better one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is for you to decide, not me. (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is-- can I write on this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Matt, Laura's in my room, Laura's in my room, that's my-- Matt, Laura's in my room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you roll wisdom saving throws.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter) You get whatever room you want.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're gone, but before we take apart this entire house, who is sleeping-- I guess they're bunking up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guess everybody doesn't need-- there are enough rooms here that people don't have to bunk up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One, two, three, four, five, technically six, if you want to take that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then there's one downstairs, that's seven.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean, you can do a lot with--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we want a spare room for guests?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, they can take the downstairs one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, we're going to have guests over?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're taking this one, the two of you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we planning to put down a little bit of roots here, is this the plan? Because I'm not saying we're necessarily going to stay here, but is this-- are we deciding that this is just going to be-- are we going to be leaving things here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I mean, this is a good question to put forward, and I'm fine either way, but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a base of operations, where you could come and go as we please, obviously, but we're not going to stay here forever.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have this together, even if we leave, I think we still have it, so property is property.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It might be useful just to have a place to come back to, to circle round if things go awry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've never had a house before that wasn't, you know, also like a club.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I've lived in some odd places, well, one odd place, one place in my life.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have you ever lived under a roof?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Not like this, no, just things that we've sort of built out of, I don't know, stuff of the earth, but I've never lived in a home like this before.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want to sleep on the balcony?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, if there is a room that's close to the balcony, I wouldn't mind if sometimes I-- I feel a little weird, or a little squirrely, that I could go outside, and sleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can be next to us, Yasha, if you want to.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll take that one in the middle, if that's not already taken.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to write Yasha on here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: While we were walking up, how secure is this thing? Is it made of wood, stone, are there windows that you can get to off the ground floor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both, actually. The foundation itself is stone, and it looks like some of the load bearing portions of the building are stone, and then there is a painted Vermaloc wood around those for decoration and additional support, so it's both.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a number of windows, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's dark out all day, anyway.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And Caleb, will you be upstairs or downstairs?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't-- I don't know-- you're with Yeza.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, of course, I'll be with Yeza, but we could take the room next to Yasha.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think there's a library, too. Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoever's staying in this far one, they have to cross through someone else's room to get here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, this could be a common room, or used for some other purpose, beside the bedroom.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then make a bedroom off of that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so let's-- I took this bed, anyway, so let's take this bed, and move it in here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, where you go, and you hang out, and you be happy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've never had a happy room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you happy before you go in, you have to be happy, or is it the room that you get happy in?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who's in the bedroom at the end, the corner suite?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: One person gets a corner room that's next to the happy room, one person gets-- this is you and Yeza.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't like that mattress in the middle, the split.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I write "Veth" or "Nott" on the map? Probably "Yeza and Veth," huh?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jester, could you maybe paint the beds together?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't need to, because-- I mean, I could.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Could you just paint out the seam?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, remember when we tried to do that before, and I made a plank of wood, but it was just a loose plank of wood? I'm afraid if I do that, it'll just be a stripe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or do you want to be downstairs? What about Fjord? Who's downstairs, and who's in the corner? Fjord?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoever is next to us, I definitely won't spy on them ever.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There is a-- this is a common room, or this could be a study, or a laboratory.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then you could be next to it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you want this corner one downstairs, under Nott, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If y'all need a strapping protector of courage and bravery of untold proportions, I don't mind sleeping next to y'all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, if you sleep, and we share a wall, we can learn morse code, and we can just tap to each other throughout the wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Or, you know what else we could do? I could paint a hole in the wall, and then we can talk to each other through the hole.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just a big hole in the wall?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like, a little one, we could--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there already a hole in the wall?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but I could make one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't think we want to deface the house that's a gift, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But if we wanted to add to it, we could.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I could add a hole in the wall.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caduceus, what are you going to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I'm going to put down roots.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And so you're going to be in the tower, outside, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, is there a place for training or anything like that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, let's turn this room that was a bedroom into a training room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's our game, we're playing for us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's, you, Jester, Yasha, Fjord, yeah, Beau, you get it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jester, this is where you're building a training room?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so I'm going to mark this as a library and laboratory.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Libra-- it's already a library, so--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but we are going to add a lab for Veth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, different ends-- I don't-- we don't have a vast library, I just mean a study.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know, but if there's a fire or something, I'm just saying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, I think there's a bloodstain in the basement, you guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think someone was just eating something with ketchup when they were holding the map.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I think there's blood, can we investigate the basement for blood?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is empty, make an investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Other than that, the room is empty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, Beau, you're okay with Nugget being in our room, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes? Of course, you know, we have patio access, maybe I can just, you know, I can--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He drools a lot, you know?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He could be in our little outdoor area.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you don't have one, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He could be our guard Nugget.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The circle is just a design in the floor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do want to do a big once over on the house, and start checking it, and see if I can find any signs of it being bugged.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to check for vibes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Detect vibes, I want to Lebowski this place.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you walk into a room and know where people have had sex?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rolled a natural one, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought I said I was, did I not say I was?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do it. Roll. When the DM changes his mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys spend the better part of a couple of hours casing the place, checking the walls, checking areas, not quite sure what you're looking for, but for any signs of tampering.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would trail along with Detect Magic as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, and what were you doing, Caduceus?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just checking the place out, just doing a walkthrough, getting a sense of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just trying to see if I feel like this place has good vibes or bad vibes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, roll a general wisdom check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't sense any evil presence. You don't sense a case somewhere that's exuding--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I might also to walk around with the Detect Magic up, just to see if it pings anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so the two of you are doing a Detect Magic pass, each of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as you both scan through the house, feeling pretty confident in your ability to locate or sense anything that gives off any sort of magical aura, but come up short.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And is the kitchen all stocked with anything, or do we need to stock it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about secret entrances, like, if we pull up the rugs and look for trapdoors--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think there are rugs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you push the clocks out of the way?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They've been pre-pushed all the way out of the way, out of the house.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then there's some sort of storage shed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You access it from the kitchen.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I guess it's a root cellar.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There is another room up here, which is yet to be chosen what it is, and the same floor, this one, and this one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is the happy room for?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's the happy room; it's for being happy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's beanbags and stuffed animals and stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But that will be right next to you, and you'll be far away from me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's got a pit built into the floor.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe entering into the library, we can, we can put a bookcase, and that's the entrance, because I've heard of these types of things before.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb's room would be hidden, then, if we made that the case.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a hidden staircase in the house that we could--?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I mean, do you want to hide a--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You have to pull on one of the books to get in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, you had a book that you got that you got. That porn book, Caleb, maybe that could be the book that you have to pull to open the latch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The seafaring, yeah, you have it still.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, we could make that the trigger for.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I may-- I've got some ideas. I may ask your assistance with a couple of things. I need to do a little stone shaping, maybe in the-- move some earth, if you can help me with that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It would be rough, but yeah, I could--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could do some stone shaping.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know some stone shaping? All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wooden roof, right? Beams, thatches, stuff like that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, with dark tiles on it, like clay tiles.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I want to watch whatever Caduceus is doing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, yeah, Caduceus, what are you doing?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not that I don't have great ambition for my room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to try and make a rooftop garden at the top of the tower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you will dig up a small hole in one of the nearby-- it's like a ten-foot radial yard around the house, before you start piercing into nearby neighboring territory.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But yeah, you can amass, how much dirt are you planning to put up there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to do something dumb.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm going to use a little Stone Shape to just shape the tower a little bit to be supportive of what I'm going to put up there, if that works out okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What spell is this in particular?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So between the two of you, definitely easy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's going to be just rounding it out a little bit to support what I'm building, and then also creating a little faux cabin-esque little chunk of it so that there's a place to sleep up there that's covered. I'll draw it out for you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And getting the dirt up there is good?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I can do that. I use Maximilian's Earthen Grasp to make the cat's claw come up out of the soil, and then just travel as soil to the top of the tower, because it can move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a comfortable amount of loose soil now on the top of your tower.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to seed it with my-- anything that's dead in there, I'm just going to start things going.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you for that, I'm going to take a look around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, if we're going to be here for a while, might as well get comfortable. And I'm going to drop right in the center, the feather, token of the tree.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: On the top of the tower.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've tried to create a little section that'll hold the roots, and hold the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you take the token, and drop it into the center of the little gap you've left in the dirt--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The token just rests in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Suddenly, a series of branches begin to extend like rapid spider legs, and as they reach out, leaves flower on the edges of these branches until eventually a large trunk (wood splintering) fires up into the sky, the canopy expanding above, to a 60-foot tall tree, a five-foot diameter trunk, which in itself is beautiful. Since all the trees in the region are red and brown in color, this is the only green-leafed tree in all of Rosohna.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, now we're going to die.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's the tree house. We have a tree house now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It goes so high on top of the tower.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hundreds and hundreds of hours of narration.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're gathering and pointing, and grabbing other folks, and there's a crowd gathering now on the outskirts of your house, as those of you who have gathered up on top of the rooftop and the tower to see what has happened glance over, and see the neighbors, very curious, and some of them concerned about this massive green tree now, a spire beacon in the center of this neighborhood in the Firmaments.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We haven't even been here half a day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did we check the lease? Are we able to make modifications to the house?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: After a scurrying sound, Frumpkin just starts climbing up the length of the tree, and disappears into the heights.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nugget goes and pees on it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In the time that we've been here, is it particularly windy in this area of Xhorhas?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I just wanted to make you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems like the buildings and the structures seem to guide most--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're not supposed to do it, but I'll do it if I have to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's actually really pretty and soothing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The trick is now are going to be figuring out if there's a way that I can...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, that's the thing, is I'm going to have to figure out a way of maybe imbuing a couple objects with some very basic Daylight spells that I can trigger off once a day.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I may have to go looking for that, or talk to the clever, clever kids about that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, it's a magic tree that came out of a token. Does it need sunlight?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I honestly planned on growing a lot more than just a tree.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we're going to be building a-- that's for the basement, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know what? It would make perfect sense.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, but I thought it would be nice to have a proper garden that reminds us of home, and a place where we can have a little sliver of something that isn't this place and I'm going to-- I have a few needs and growing things in some sunlight is one of them--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, having a giant 60 foot tree in your bedroom is a totally basic need that I think we can all--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Something I've had my entire life.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't have a lot of needs. This is one of them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The crowd isn't dispersing, but they definitely are aware that you're aware of them, so they're being quieter.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I may go down and say hello to everyone, to people at the gate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: ...curious, and definitely a bit off-put by both the presence of the tree and the general lack of firbolgs in Rosohna. Some of them are curious, some of them are dubious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then slowly, people begin to disperse a bit, though their attention is still over their shoulder in this strange, new visual wooden monolith that sits in the center of the district.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So excited. I have so many plans.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything else anyone wants to do with it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why don't we make this room a meeting room, a planning room?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need to go shopping and stuff.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can just hang out in these places. It's nice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This last one could be maybe a guest room?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But, Beauregard, didn't you want some sort of a training pit or something?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But that's what we're doing downstairs, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, we have training, we have study, we have the happy room, the war room, right next to each other.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The kitchen and dining room, the kitchen and dining room, so really the only-- and Caduceus is up top here, so the only thing--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I love that book, War and Happy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, let's leave that for when we have a need.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's guest-room-to-be, but storage right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, Room of Requirement, for sure.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: After we talk about things in the war room, then we can go into the happy room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And just dance around, and, like.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel like the neighbor in Mary Poppins, who just fires off the cannon every hour.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we're going to need sheets, towels--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They come with sheets. They don't come with towels, we'll say, we'll say--

lines.name: TRAVIS

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Remember? This was a while back. We were in Zadash, I want to say?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have explained Astrid to Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You talked to me about Astrid.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She just said Astrid, and I just wrote it. If you-- if there's something I'm not supposed to know or something--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I didn't know it was such a secret--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought she was an old friend of yours from when you were a student.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You seemed like you liked her a lot, Caleb.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we said something about being relatives, needing to contact her for some sort of--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, yes, we said that we were going to offer her a lot of money or something, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think it was an inheritance that we had to find for her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we didn't say anything about--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about a return address, or?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I believe this was at the Pillow Trove?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, it was at the Pillow-- you know, we should really go back to Zadash.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think we said if you have any information, send it to the Pillow Trove.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Oh my gosh! You know what I'm going to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to Send a message to the owner of the Pillow Trove.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have there been any letters or packages for me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who's the fucking package from, then?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Open it up. What is in it? Tell me about it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is that? What is that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it's our-- my pen pal. Our pen pal.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if it was baked goods or something? I bet they're really gross now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There is also a letter, it seems."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's a letter. There's a letter.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ask if there's-- use your fucking spell again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't you need that stone-- nevermind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I Send another message. Who's the letter from? Is it for, is--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's from the Soltryce Academy. It seems official.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll never go back to Zadash--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll never go back to Zadash, and if we do--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we have to go back, because that's where my dad is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll kill the owner. Burn down her establishment, and no one will ever know that we were ever there, or that it exists.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you make any, any mention of any of us, of anyone you know--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we said our name was Nott-- we said our, that Nott and Lavore, lawyer--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We put our name on it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You used-- you used the name Lavore?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe not, maybe I didn't. Maybe it was just Nott.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It might have been Nott the Brave, or-- no, that's probably not what we said.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was like Lavore and Company, Attorneys at Law, or something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you used that name, maybe.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ms. Lavore of Nott and Brave firm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think they're going to hurt her?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Have you spoken to her recently?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I did talk to her very recently.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want to help you see her, but we should be very careful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, but you can take us to Nicodranas whenever we need to go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I just wanted to you to have a friend.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, at the time, it was really touch and go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're really standoffish, and-- (laughter) This was a while back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think this was right after you did the mud on your face thing, and it was-- I felt really guilty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's as much my fault as anyone's.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no, no, no, don't blame yourself, it's our fault--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I mean, you were there, too, you could have stopped me, you could have stopped me at any moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't know what I was doing, so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, neither did I, you think I know what I'm doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think the time when someone comes to find me is inevitable at this point, but that is possibly one point of entry, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, but do you like Astrid?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe she'll just want to hang out and be friends again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's the only corner you had to--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No way, so much as I've been waiting on-- (knocking)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stop snoring and open the door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When are you intending to get in touch with Dairon?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because I don't think we should free ball this any longer, I think we need to bring her in, and I was--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just slowly close the door on Caleb.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to talk to you through the door, and everyone will hear me, or you can let me in, because this is important--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We-- we need to have some sort of plan, Beauregard.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Because we have just made an allegiance with the leaders of a foreign power.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm an initiate, I'm-- more or less in training to be an Expositor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think you may have graduated ahead of time, Beauregard.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But everything that I report is going to have to be cherry picked and strategic, and the more information I give up, the more I can jeopardize everything we're doing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But neither of us are traitors to the Empire.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And Dairon can give us legitimacy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you're right, we're not traitors yet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But I don't think we can just run roughshod over the Empire, and do whatever we want, we are going to get killed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We also might get killed here, we are humans in a very unwanted territory.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, we are gambling, to be sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think every day is going to be a gamble.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, so what do you want to do? Do you want to keep Dairon on the outside of this, or bring her in? Think about it, you don't have to answer me now, but think about it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I don't want that that to happen.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you in love with Nott? (Laura laughs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't need an insight check, I know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just saying, it got, there was (clicks) some vibes kicking, or some pheromones going on when we were on that moorbounder.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you, think about that, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: As I close the door, I just whisper to myself, I knew that would get him out of my fucking room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When this guy is out to shop or look around, I'm going to go sit and wait in his room, and wait up for him to come back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When he's doing that, me and Caduceus are turning this area--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We figured out how to set it up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We learned how to do it, we're going to do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With stone shape and create water.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And very easy to just make a little heater--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For underneath it, we're going to make, like, a pizza oven sort of--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So you just have a thing so that the water--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just have a thing so that I can throw a fire bolt in the bottom.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Create and Destroy Water would be very helpful here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One thing to note, too, the central portion of that tower, the roots are growing through the stone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The spa's on the bottom floor, but I'm just letting you know, on the halfway up-- the actual roof above, where the tree connects with them underneath, there is about a foot and a half of just dozens and dozens of thick roots that are all dangling, through, that are pushed through the stone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) First level spells, proper use of magic, all right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I just need a soak to relieve the tension.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have you just tried putting the pieces back together?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, he needs to go north to the elves.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you had something, Nott?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I was just going to chemistry that stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, because you have Yeza helping you, I will say it is intelligence-based, so an intelligence modifier, with your proficiency modifier, with advantage, and an additional, I'll say plus two on top of that, just for having Yeza's help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So your proficiency modifier is plus--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven plus two, it's plus nine that these rolls with advantage, so what do you want to create?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Some sort of flare or tracer bolt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How many do you want to make?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three. I would say it would be ten gold worth of materials per bolt, so 30 gold to create the three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make some rolls for me, first one with advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, so not a problem with creating that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, and the last one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah, so you make three flare bolts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially what you do is, they have a fuse to the back of it, you ignite the fuse, and then fire upward, and it burns it off as it arcs upward, and it burns off by the time it hits the end of your range on the bolt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it burns along the path.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One tangle foot bag, and one smoke bomb of some sort.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That will act as, loosely an entangle spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a smaller ten foot radius, as opposed to a--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a DC of 12, so write that down, a DC of 12, ten foot radius.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So to create one of those, I'll say 50 gold, with the materials.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus nine, okay, yeah, DC was 20 on that, so you have one of those.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a smoke bomb? I'll say five gold of materials, it's not too much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the smoke bomb is an action to use, and until the end of your next round, in a five foot radius around you, you have-- it is heavily obscured.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, just five foot radius, okay, like, five foot on each, both sides?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On each, on each side, yeah, so as you throw it down, and then that area right there becomes heavily obscured.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm just going to enjoy making all of these things over the hours with Yeza, helping him, watching his deft, nimble hands dance across the chemicals.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Though you have a few things, as well, to surprise him with, and the two of you together, it's less-- you notice in the time that you've spent working on your own chemicals, and your adventuring, the dynamic becomes less of chemist and assistant, and more partners.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And can I try one more thing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or you can throw it, and I can blow it up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say that'll be 50 gold to try and create.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, no, it's fine, I'll take it, I'll take it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to go ahead and check one thing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't need this gold to, you know, save my child or anything. It's fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just buy his way into college.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I just thought that you played soccer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does anyone else need any chemistry shit?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just a little help setting up the spa.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I need you to look at my hair foil.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can look at the hair oil.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, let me know, and make sure it's not gross or something.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt is taking this fluffernutter very seriously.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to say, for materials, though, because you're making it, 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Which acts as-- the same as dynamite, or blasting powder.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anybody else have anything else they want to accomplish--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I would love to pick up my bracers, and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, forged, comfortable, they're made to the specifications, and the shapes that Wursh went ahead and-- Wursh crafted for you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is there an enchanter in town, or anything like that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yo, girl, pick up my clothes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, that's right, we all got to pick up our clothes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Asking around, the best information you get is that you probably have to commission somebody at the Marble Tomes Conservatory.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Head on over to the Marble Tome.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Would anyone like to go to the Marble Tomes? I'm going to head over there for-- I just have to ask some things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yasha I want to so bad, we're just making this spa, and, like--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This thing is really taking up everything right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Beau and Yasha are going?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, what are the t-- like a library?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go, too, because I'm bored.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like a reverse shopping episode for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll get to that in just a second.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, I'm hiding in his room up there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys arrive-- you recognize from the time that you've been here with Caleb to eventually talk your way through, and find at least one of the guards who was here previously when you had met with Waccoh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, it's the same humans, yes, those humans, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that how you talk to them every time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see a very young, fresh-faced dark-elf woman, the equivalent of what you'd expect a late teens human, as far as just bright eyed, and excited. Smooth, young skin.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or did they leave Fjord and Caleb behind? The four of us went walking together.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you're going-- okay, I thought you said you were still waiting for him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That happens at some point in this week--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But they step out and, "Hello, I am Enchanter Yun, "and I have been-- this is a curious group."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I didn't think I would actually get a chance "to see who that is. Oh, you've become quite a-- "quite a conversation piece in the Conservatory."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Has Waccoh spoken well of us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Waccoh, nobody really speaks to Waccoh, "but there has been rumors spreading of "the human folk, the ex-pats, "helping the Queen."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We come with a bit of business, though, our friend here is--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have these bracers, and I wanted to see if you could, by chance, enchant them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, these are finely made, they are definitely ready "for an-- what sort of enchantment are you looking for, "if I might ask?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm looking for something that would give me a little bit more protection.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Something similar to what she is holding right there, maybe?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, that was the inspiration, so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could you do the same with this precious gold ring?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For one such an enchantment here, it would run about-- "3,000 gold pieces."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And would take roughly, "I would say, "about ten weeks."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But, but if-- "if you were to pay an additional, say, "60 percent onto that price, we can have a second enchanter, "and have it done in five weeks."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a little rich for my blood, I will take the ring. Thank you for the information, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No problem. Well, our services are available, "at least as long as you carry those emblems."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What if we did a payment plan situation?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It could be to start, and then whenever they're ready, I can come back and give you more money every time I get some.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you could "provide "at least 1,000 gold, "we could begin, and expect the remainder of payment upon completion."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is under the expectation that should you not turn up "for the remainder amount, the project is forfeited "to the Dynasty, and it is to be outfitted "to one of our elite soldiers."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What would you say if we were to offer our services for a slight discount on that item? Surely there's some dirty work you need done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Me? No, not-- I-- "I spend most of my time and, well, to be honest, "most of my life within these halls since coming of age, but "I'm sure there are means of making coin throughout, "in these times."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, there's no shortage of that, just curious if you needed any particular itches scratched.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Me, no. I-- "I'm just--" And you see her eyes get a little, a little embarrassed, "I'm, "I'm more of a-- a researcher."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough. Yasha, I have the other half of that thousand, if you want.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's a lot of money, Fjord.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You get hit all the time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's almost like I've seen it myself.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll pay you back, how about that?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right, if we leave you 1,000, I'll leave these, and we'll come back for-- I'll bring the rest.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe we can speed the process a little--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Maybe we can spreed the process up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But like I said, we have to agree "that this payment is forfeit if you do not return "to pick up the item."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well." All right, so you guys pay the 1,000 gold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there a public book area where we can get to in this place, or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) But also, if they have any dunamantic elements, those are probably very much considered of interest to anyone directly within the state, or of approved interest.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you want Fjord and I to create a distraction?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I, before we leave, write out a handwritten invitation to Professor Waccoh to visit the first Kryn tree house here in Rosohna.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And leave it with this woman.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want to stay for dinner? Caduceus is probably whipping up something delicious and vegan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, I'm quite all right, I have some research to do, "but I appreciate the offer."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Boy, your face just does not look as inviting as you think it does.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, sorry, see I hadn't-- sorry.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, just get a little pinch on the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is the nature of your research?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sternly) Do you want to come in for dinner?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Would you like to take a break from your research, and maybe just get a drink?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you know anything about our neighbors to the left, the family of Lord Bilan?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: By the way, I tried to ask, just in case he was also a member of Den Thalen, Thelyss? He didn't volunteer what den he was a part of, is that a faux pas?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not particularly, no, but he is from Den Bilan."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The surnames, they're adopted from the dens."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But there's four dens, right? There's only four dens?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Got his own cell service, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then there's many other dens.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Bilan's not one of the main three, though.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you know who lives-- who our other neighbors are?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It seems empty to us, but apparently not?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm not too familiar with this neighborhood."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He knows that there's a team of mercenaries, and they're-- 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't live in this area, so."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What neighborhood? I'm being very forward, I'm sorry, you don't have to tell me, nevermind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tell me your address and phone number.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you don't mind, just throwing it out there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't have to, but if you wanted to write it down--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Most of my den live within the Lucid Bastion, "but I spend a lot of my time either researching "dunamantic pursuits within the Bastion, "or within the Conservatory."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are those the main avenues for learning such?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know that we are new here, but I am very interested in tutelage in this field, and you have been privy to our conversations with your queen, and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Show me something impressive, show me something "at the height of your power. You are arcanist, yes?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want to go inside for this? Or at least in the threshold of the walls and not be in the street?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A translucent cat floats just in front of Essek's face, and (explosion) a gigantic claw flexes in front of Essek, between me and him, and is interposing between me and him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I immediately look around and see if anyone's watching.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A lot of people are watching.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is the third weirdest thing that's happened.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's-- you guys have become the weird neighbors real fast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And the cat claw does one of these.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And, if I might ask, what is it that you're seeking? "What is your ultimate goal? Anyone who pursues such magics, "to an extent, has something that they wish to do."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What I'm very curious about is the arcane here, in your country.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But as you know, my people are perverting your magic, and we wish to work with you to prevent that, as we have exhibited, and I wish to understand better, so that I can better help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. He looks over and goes, "Are you busy right now?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I invited you twice, but yeah, yeah, go ahead, enter, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, it would be lovely to have you inside our home.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The cats claw turns sideways, and just one claw hooks into the door, and pulls it open.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We look down from the tree.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A slight bow. Do come in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A bit empty, but it could work."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want that cocktail? Caduceus has been making something with turmeric that's really weird.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a very refreshing cocktail, perfect for this nice fall breeze.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look at that. Did you see that fucking host? I'm a fucking host! Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essek traces something in the air with his finger, and you-- this slight glow emerges, and you watch from the glow as it pulls out and widens, a tome just apparates into his hand.
